name: The Terrible Game
description:
This is the terrible game. A game where your only objective is complete level after level as a square. 

This game is my first game ever published and it was created for Dani's Game Jam. I had lot of fun creating it, and it was quite a challenge doing game with this small amount of time. I also want to thank AdekGrubas for support. But most importantly:  Thanks for playing!
